official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an inflation adjustment for the amount exempted from gift tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $3,000 to $6,100 the amount of the annual gift tax exclusion. Provides for an annual inflation adjustment of such amount based on increases in the Consumer Price Index.
